text:
When you're digitally transforming your business,
nearly every decision is based on data.
But disparate tools, teams, data sources and types can create silos,

making it a challenge to understand where data sits,
how to connect it, and how to get value from it.

So while small and medium sized businesses
are beginning to store their data in the cloud,
many still struggle to extract insights from their data.
Which means that for the majority,

any data based decisions they're making
are only based on part of the picture.
By moving to a modern cloud based data strategy,

businesses of any size can not only securely move
and store any amount of data at scale,

they can also build connections across multiple
types of data and seamlessly access it.

Extracting powerful all full picture insights
that they can act on with confidence.

With Amazon Web Services, your business
will have the tools and resources you need

to build a smart data strategy one that's
the right fit for your business and budget today
and can scale and adapt in the future.

Because digital transformation isn't just about
gathering and processing more data,

it's about making it unified and accessible so that
your business can make better, more informed decisions,

respond quickly to the unexpected,
and uncover new opportunities.

Bottom line, you can innovate faster and create more products
and experiences to delight your customers.
Only AWS provides the capabilities businesses need

for an end to end data strategy that will
serve them now and in the future.
Making the complexities of data management simpler

and helping you spend less time managing data
and more time getting value from it.
Visit the Smart Business Hub to learn more.
